summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 JEEP PATRIOT. WHILE DRIVING 25 MPH, THE VEHICLE STALLED WITHOUT WARNING AND WAS UNABLE TO RESTART. THE VEHICLE HAD TO BE JUMPSTARTED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE FAILURE OCCURRED FIVE ADDITIONAL TIMES. THE MANUFACTURER AND DEALER WERE NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE CONTACT TOOK THE VEHICLE TO AUTO ZONE AND WAS INFORMED THAT THE CRANK SHAFT FAILED AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 50,000.
